org.everit.osgi.dev.maven

Class AbstractEOSGiMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • org.everit.osgi.dev.maven.AbstractEOSGiMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnalyseMojo, DistMojo

    public abstract class AbstractEOSGiMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
    Mojos that extend this class can use the environment information defined for the plugin.

    • Field Detail

      • analyticsReferer

        @Parameter(property="eosgi.analytics.referer",
           defaultValue="eosgi-maven-plugin")
protected String analyticsReferer
        The name of the referer that means who execute goal (example: eosgi-maven-plugin or eclipse-e4-plugin, ...). Default value is "eosgi-maven-plugin".

      • analyticsWaitingTimeInMs

        @Parameter(property="eosgi.analytics.waiting.time",
           defaultValue="3000")
private long analyticsWaitingTimeInMs
        The waiting time to send the analytics to Google Analytics server.

      • environmentId

        @Parameter(property="eosgi.environmentId",
           defaultValue="*")
protected String environmentId
        Comma separated list of the id of the environments that should be processed. Default is * that means all environments.

      • environments

        @Parameter
protected EnvironmentConfiguration[] environments
        The environments on which the tests should run.

      • environmentsToProcess

        private EnvironmentConfiguration[] environmentsToProcess

      • executedProject

        @Parameter(property="executedProject")
protected org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject executedProject

      • googleAnalyticsTrackingService

        private GoogleAnalyticsTrackingService googleAnalyticsTrackingService

      • mojo

        @Parameter(defaultValue="${mojoExecution}",
           readonly=true)
protected org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecution mojo

      • project

        @Parameter(property="project")
protected org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject project
        The Maven project.

      • skipAnalytics

        @Parameter(property="eosgi.analytics.skip",
           defaultValue="false")
private boolean skipAnalytics
        Skip analytics tracking or not. That means send event statistics to Google Analytics or not. Default value is false that means send statistics.

                   throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException,
                          org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoFailureException

      • findMatchingSettings

        private BundleSettings findMatchingSettings(EnvironmentConfiguration environment,
                                  String symbolicName,
                                  String bundleVersion)

      • generateDistributableArtifacts

        protected List<DistributableArtifact> generateDistributableArtifacts(EnvironmentConfiguration environment)
                                                              throws MalformedURLException
        Getting the processed artifacts of the project. The artifact list is calculated each time when the function is called therefore the developer should not call it inside an iteration.
        Parameters:
        environment - Configuration of the environment that the distributable artifacts will be generated for.
        Returns:
        The list of dependencies that are OSGI bundles but do not have the scope "provided"
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException - if the URL for the artifact is broken.

      • getDefaultEnvironment

        protected EnvironmentConfiguration getDefaultEnvironment()
        Returns the default environment. This method is called when there is no environment configured for the plugin.
        Returns:
        The default environment.

      • getEnvironments

        protected EnvironmentConfiguration[] getEnvironments()
        Returns the environments that are configured for this plugin or the default environment configuration if no environments are configured.
        Returns:
        The list of environments that are defined for the plugin.

      • getEnvironmentsToProcess

        protected EnvironmentConfiguration[] getEnvironmentsToProcess()
        Getting an array of the environment configurations that should be processed based on the value of the environmentId parameter. The value, that is returned, is calculated the first time the function is called.
        Returns:
        The array of environment ids that should be processed.

      • getGoogleAnalyticsTrackingService

        private GoogleAnalyticsTrackingService getGoogleAnalyticsTrackingService()
        Gets GoogleAnalyticsTrackingService instance.

      • processArtifact

        public DistributableArtifact processArtifact(EnvironmentConfiguration environment,
                                    org.apache.maven.artifact.Artifact artifact)
        Checking if an artifact is an OSGI bundle. An artifact is an OSGI bundle if the MANIFEST.MF file inside contains a Bundle-SymbolicName.
        Parameters:
        environment - The environment that uses the artifact.
        artifact - The artifact that is checked.
        Returns:
        A DistributableArtifact with the Bundle-SymbolicName and a Bundle-Version. Bundle-Version comes from MANIFEST.MF but if Bundle-Version is not available there the default 0.0.0 version is provided.
